sample_docs: Key benefits of recognition technologies Instant recognition, extraction and export of clean data from documents, including media data — fingerprints and facial photos Prevent fraudsters from trying to defraud your service by adding controls at key stages of the user journey Reduce friction between the user and your service through automation. The technology of biometric data recognition and comparison with a reference model. Liveness — Instant verification of whether there is a real live person or a fraudulent image in front of us. Face matching — Matching the face to a reference photo in a document or database. 1:1 or 1:N comparison. Face matching — Matching the face to a reference photo in a document or database. 1:1 or 1:N comparison. Fingerprint remote verification — Comparison of the print pattern on a document and a client's photo using a smartphone. Fingerprint remote verification — Comparison of the print pattern on a document and a client's photo using a smartphone. Accurate recognition of official documents, QR codes and barcodes. Document Verification — Recognition, checking, extraction and export of clean data to the client system. Works for international passports, driver's licenses and national IDs. Document Verification — Recognition, checking, extraction and export of clean data to the client system. Works for international passports, driver's licenses and national IDs.
